20101221235344.000|20101221235347.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20101221235347.000|20101221235349.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20101221235349.000|20101221235350.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20101221235350.000|20101221235350.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20101221235350.000|20101221235353.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20101221235353.000|20101221235353.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20101221235353.000|20101221235356.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20101221235356.000|20101221235356.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20101221235356.000|20101221235359.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20101221235359.000|20101221235359.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20101221235359.000|20101221235359.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20101221235359.000|20101221235402.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20101221235402.000|20101221235402.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20101221235402.000|20101221235405.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20101221235405.000|20101221235405.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20101221235405.000|20101221235407.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20101221235407.000|20101221235407.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20101221235407.000|20101221235410.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20101221235410.000|20101221235410.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20101221235410.000|20101221235411.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20101221235411.000|20101221235411.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20101221235411.000|20101221235414.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20101221235414.000|20101221235414.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20101221235414.000|20101221235416.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20101221235416.000|20101221235416.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20101221235416.000|20101221235420.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20101221235420.000|20101221235420.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20101221235420.000|20101221235421.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20101221235421.000|20101221235421.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20101221235421.000|20101221235424.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20101221235424.000|20101221235425.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20101221235425.000|20101221235425.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20101221235425.000|20101221235428.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20101221235428.000|20101221235428.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20101221235428.000|20101221235430.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20101221235430.000|20101221235430.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20101221235430.000|20101221235433.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20101221235433.000|20101221235433.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20101221235433.000|20101221235434.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20101221235434.000|20101221235434.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20101221235434.000|20101221235438.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.
